alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Bamberg; Barnwell; Calhoun; Central Orangeburg; Lexington; Northwestern Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 5:42PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Calhoun, northeastern Barnwell, northwestern Bamberg, southeastern Lexington, eastern Aiken and northwestern Orangeburg Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 542 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles east of Aiken Municipal Airport to near Aiken State Park to 6 miles east of New Ellenton. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Williston, Blackville, Sandy Run, Aiken State Park, Swansea, Wagener, North, Pelion, Springfield, Salley, Neeses, Norway, Perry, Elko, Woodford, Livingston, Windsor, Aiken Gopher Tortoise Heritage Preserve, Perry Airport, and Thor. This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 125 and 128. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for central South Carolina.

area.areaDesc: Aiken; Bamberg; Barnwell; Calhoun; Central Orangeburg; Lexington; Northwestern Orangeburg
